subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Reggie Bush may lose his Heisman Trophy, and U.S.C. could be stripped of its 2004 title, if an N.C.A.A. investigation proves that he and his family accepted gifts and money from marketing agents.
snippet: Reggie Bush may lose his Heisman Trophy, and U.S.C. could be stripped of its 2004 title, if an N.C.A.A. investigation proves that he and his family accepted gifts and money from marketing agents.
